name: Twine
headline: AI text message receptionist for SMBs
description: Twine makes sure your small business never misses a potential customer because of a missed call. We use conversational AI to engage customers over text, finding out what they need and booking them for a service.

founders.name: Anand Valavalkar, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder/CEO @ Twine | Previously UT Austin CS, Superhuman | Founded 6 Figure Networking & Audio/Visual Installation Company in High School

founders.name: Omar Imtiaz, Founder
founders.description: Omar Imtiaz is the CTO and co-founder of Twine. Helping small, service-based businesses transform missed calls into paying customers.

founders.name: Divyesh Khatri, Founder
founders.description: Product @ Twine | Design & CS @ Stanford | From Houston, TX

# Instantly service every customer.
# Instantly service every customer.
# Instantly service every customer.
# Instantly service every customer.
Twine's AI business partner helps you capture and respond to every lead as soon as they reach out.
Twine's AI business partner helps you capture and respond to every lead as soon as they reach out.
Twine's AI business partner helps you capture and respond to every lead as soon as they reach out.
Hey, thanks for stopping by! Let me introduce myself. I'm Twine, your business's AI receptionist.
We help businesses get more customers from their existing leads without having to hire more staff.
Hey! How do you do that?
Hey! How do you do that?
Hey! How do you do that?
Hey! How do you do that?
We can do everything your receptionist can do, from setting appointments, rescheduling, and even taking payments for services!
And this is all over text?
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/gepi0rLkIo7GppF9YzLnQTxKGgE.webp)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Haq4NDuB2vq1dCRTYt32swgHzuU.webp)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/PCWl2TTMj2DundTkZ6lqN09C1Ac.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/zbokeLekUuhcQmhcDfUXWDMIoB0.webp)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/hKbwQ028PCS9lTKwkPmR3QHuq8s.png)
Twine responds to and answers customer questions across every single one of your channels, getting customers scheduled on your calendar. 
We're trained on your business, and Twine answers exactly how you would.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/rMQushMBy8fEiYHQCktStEpq52Q.webp)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/rMQushMBy8fEiYHQCktStEpq52Q.webp)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/rMQushMBy8fEiYHQCktStEpq52Q.webp)
Twine can even process your payments for you and ensure you get services paid on time!
And we follow up with customers and request reviews after the service!
That sounds awesome!
Can I try it out?
Sure, text us at +1(415)423-0877 to try it out!
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/1AO6fltE1U1DXecyjzHIUUyycU.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/xYaIMYBPSaV3weYXoKFVP8UJo.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/MBGXhjo9LADX4jztozWhbmI4.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/6fATZT1GEyTNZnlbQkBTrVNEqhU.png)
And the best part is all your customer information and bookings sync perfectly with your existing software
…and to your personalized dashboard!
![Dashboard](https://framerusercontent.com/images/pZS0gBgW5XIchntd3d6tJvYBbw.png?scale-down-to=2048)
![Dashboard](https://framerusercontent.com/images/pZS0gBgW5XIchntd3d6tJvYBbw.png?scale-down-to=2048)
![Dashboard](https://framerusercontent.com/images/pZS0gBgW5XIchntd3d6tJvYBbw.png?scale-down-to=2048)
## Manage your bookings stress-free.
Twine works to get you more customers, 24/7. Rest easy, knowing that Twine has your back.
![Staff talking](https://framerusercontent.com/images/sHJQIYIrki2ekQMuV1upItj3taY.png)
#### Reviews
Twine AI helps you get more reviews with conversational AI.
![Staff talking](https://framerusercontent.com/images/lDKbPUUJhQRUlRVfPwEGgh35ls.png)
#### Infinitely customizable
Twine isn't just a chatbot. It's a business partner trained just for you.
![Staff talking](https://framerusercontent.com/images/lDKbPUUJhQRUlRVfPwEGgh35ls.png)
#### Infinitely customizable
Twine isn't just a chatbot. It's a business partner trained just for you.
![Staff talking](https://framerusercontent.com/images/8pNUIhNsol449Ekwnd7vIiLLSc.png)
#### Payments
Get all of your invoices paid quicker with SMS payments. 
![Staff talking](https://framerusercontent.com/images/8pNUIhNsol449Ekwnd7vIiLLSc.png)
#### Payments
Get all of your invoices paid quicker with SMS payments. 
### Set Up your AI assistant
#### Let's customize your AI assistant to match your business needs.
Select your biggest challenges

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Twine**

- **Founded:** 2023  
- **Location:** San Francisco, California  
- **Team Size:** 4 employees  
- **Y Combinator Batch:** S23  
- **Group Partner:** Harj Taggar  
- **Website:** [usetwine.com](http://www.usetwine.com)  

### Mission
Twine is on a mission to ensure small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs) never miss a customer due to missed calls. They harness the power of conversational AI to engage clients via text, discover their needs, and book services efficiently.

### What Does Twine Do?
In essence, think of Twine as your very own AI text message receptionist. Here's how it stands out:

- **Real-Time Engagement:** Twine captures every lead the moment they reach out, which is a game-changer for customer service in small businesses.
  
- **Full-Service Capabilities:** It handles everything a receptionist usually would—setting appointments, rescheduling, taking payments, and even following up with customers for reviews—all while ensuring the conversation feels personal.

- **Seamless Integration:** The AI is not just about conversations; it syncs effortlessly with existing business software, making the management of bookings and customer interactions stress-free.

- **Customization:** Unlike standard chatbots, Twine tailors its conversational style and responses to mimic the unique voice of your business.

### Current Operations
